activities: MDSL stores the name, phone number and call records for mobile phones used by the employees in the EU of MDSL clients for whom MDSL provides telecom expense management services. This is done in order to allow cost control measures to be identified and actioned.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
industrysector: Computer Software - (CSF)Computer Services - (CSV)Management Consulting Services - (MCS)Telecommunications Services - (TES)
recoursemech: Individuals wishing to raise a dispute can contact in the first instance the Chief Operating Officer at the contact numbers provided. There is no fee to file or review a dispute. If the matter cannot be satisfactorily resolved, then the individual is recommended to contact the relevant data protection authorities located in their home country in the EU or Switzerland. MDSL maintains its commitment to cooperate with data protection authorities located in the European Union or Switzerland or their authorized representatives.
